---
title: "Sergio Ruiz-Carmona's CV"
author: Sergio Ruiz-Carmona
date: "`r Sys.Date()`"
params:
  pdf_mode:
    value: false # true for links in bottom
output:
  pagedown::html_resume:
    css: ['dd_cv.css', 'resume']
    self_contained: true
---

```{r, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  results='asis',
  echo = FALSE
)

library(magrittr) # For the pipe
source("cv_printing_functions.r")

# Read in all data and initialize a CV printer object
if(file.exists("cv.rda")) {
  load("cv.rda")
} else {
  CV <- create_CV_object(
    data_location = "https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1D_MQxoi1XXoQLWSI3mH1Qo6tkctnENAij0-d3BEohu0",  
    pdf_mode = params$pdf_mode
  )
  save(CV, file="cv.rda")
}
```


```{r}
# When in pdf export mode the little dots are unaligned, so fix that with some conditional CSS.
if(params$pdf_mode) {
    cat("
<style>
:root{
  --decorator-outer-offset-left: -6.5px;
}
</style>")
}
```


Aside
================================================================================

```{r}
# Build interactive network of positions colored by section
# and connected if they occurred in the same year
datadrivencv::build_network_logo(CV$entries_data %>%
                                   dplyr::filter(section != "N/A" &
                                                   section != "skills_and_training"),
                                 angle=220,
                                 # rx=100, ry=150,
                                 vb1=70, vb2=-60, vb3=100, vb4=400
                                 )
```


```{r}
if(params$pdf_mode){
  cat("View this CV [online](https://cv.ruizsergio.com/full)")
} else {
  cat("<i class='fas fa-download'></i> [Download in PDF](https://cv.ruizsergio.com/full.pdf)")
}
```
